GV02gopthbru:1_0: oṃ brahma ha vā idam agra āsīt svayaṃ tv ekam eva tad aikṣata mahad vai yakṣaṃ tad
GV02gopthbru:1_1: ekam evāsmi hantāhaṃ mad eva manmātraṃ dvitīyaṃ devaṃ nirmama iti tad abhyaśrāmyad
GV02gopthbru:1_2: abhyatapat samatapat tasya śrāntasya taptasya saṃtaptasya lalāṭe sneho yad ārdryam
GV02gopthbru:1_3: ājāyata tenānandat tam abravīt mahad vai yakṣaṃ suvedam avidāmaha iti / tad yad abravīt
GV02gopthbru:1_4: mahad vai yakṣaṃ suvedam avidāmaha iti tasmāt suvedo 'bhavattaṃ vā etaṃ suvedaṃ santaṃ
GV02gopthbru:1_5: sveda ity ācakṣate / parokṣeṇa parokṣapriyā iva hi devā bhavanti pratyakṣadviṣaḥ || GpBr_1,1.1 ||
GV02gopthbru:2_0: sa bhūyo 'śrāmyad bhūyo 'tapyat bhūya ātmānaṃ samatapat tasya śrāntasya taptasya
GV02gopthbru:2_1: saṃtaptasya sarvebhyo romagartebhyaḥ pṛthak svedadhārāḥ prāsyandanta / tābhir anandat
GV02gopthbru:2_2: tad abravīd ābhir vā aham idaṃ sarvaṃ dhārayiṣyāmi yad idaṃ kiṃcābhir vā aham idaṃ
GV02gopthbru:2_3: sarvaṃ janayiṣyāmi yad idaṃ kiṃcābhir vā aham idaṃ sarvam āpsyāmi yad idaṃ kiṃceti /
GV02gopthbru:2_4: tad yad abravīd ābhir vā aham idaṃ sarvaṃ dhārayiṣyāmi yad idaṃ kiṃceti tasmāt dhārā
GV02gopthbru:2_5: abhavaṃs taddhārāṇāṃ dhārātvaṃ yac cāsu dhriyate / tad yad abravīd ābhir vā aham
GV02gopthbru:2_6: idaṃ sarvaṃ janayiṣyāmi yad idaṃ kiṃceti tasmāj jāyā abhavaṃs tajjāyānāṃ jāyātvaṃ
GV02gopthbru:2_7: yac cāsu puruṣo jāyate yac ca putraḥ punnāmanarakam anekaśatatāraṃ tasmāt trāti putras
GV02gopthbru:2_8: tat putrasya putratvam / tad yad abravīd ābhir vā aham idaṃ sarvam āpsyāmi yad idaṃ
GV02gopthbru:2_9: kiṃceti tasmād āpo 'bhavaṃs tad apām aptvam āpnoti vai sa sarvān kāmān yān kāmayate // GpBr_1,1.2 //
GV02gopthbru:3_0: tā apaḥ sṛṣṭvānvaikṣata tāsu svāṃ chāyām apaśyat tām asyekṣamāṇasya svayaṃ reto 'skandat
GV02gopthbru:3_1: tad apsu pratyatiṣṭhat tās tatraivābhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tāḥ śrāntās taptāḥ
GV02gopthbru:3_2: saṃtaptāḥ sārdham eva retasā dvaidham abhavaṃs tāsām anyā anyatarā atilavaṇā apeyā
GV02gopthbru:3_3: asvādvyas tā aśāntā retaḥ samudraṃ vṛtvātiṣṭhann athetarāḥ peyāḥ svādvyaḥ śāntās
GV02gopthbru:3_4: tās tatraivābhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tābhyaḥ śrāntābhyas taptābhyaḥ saṃtaptābhyo
GV02gopthbru:3_5: yad reta āsīt tad abhṛjjyata yad abhṛjjyata tasmād bhṛguḥ samabhavat tad bhṛgor bhṛgutvaṃ
GV02gopthbru:3_6: bhṛgur iva vai sa sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti ya evaṃ veda // GpBr_1,1.3 //
GV02gopthbru:4_0: sa bhṛguṃ sṛṣṭvāntaradhīyata sa bhṛguḥ sṛṣṭaḥ prāṅ ejatataṃ vāg anvavadad vāyo vāyo
GV02gopthbru:4_1: iti saṃnyavartata sa dakṣiṇāṃ diśam ejatataṃ vāg anvavadat mātariśvan mātariśvann
GV02gopthbru:4_2: iti sa nyavartata sa pratīcīṃ diśam ejatataṃ vāg anvavadat pavamānaḥ pavamāna iti
GV02gopthbru:4_3: sa nyavartata sa udīcīṃ diśam ejatataṃ vāg anvavadad vāta vāteti tam abravīn nanv
GV02gopthbru:4_4: avidāmaha iti na hīty athārvāṅ enam etāsv evāpsv anviccheti tad yad abravīd athārvāṅ
GV02gopthbru:4_5: enam etāsv evāpsv anviccheti tad atharvābhavat tad atharvaṇo 'tharvatvam / tasya
GV02gopthbru:4_6: ha vā etasya bhagavato 'tharvaṇa ṛṣer yatheva brahmaṇī lomāni yathāṅgāni yathā prāṇa
GV02gopthbru:4_7: evam evāsya sarva ātmā samabhavat tam atharvāṇaṃ brahmābravīt prajāpateḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā
GV02gopthbru:4_8: pālayasveti / tad yad abravīt prajāpateḥ prajā sṛṣṭvā pālayasveti tasmāt prajāpatir
GV02gopthbru:4_9: abhavat tat prajāpateḥ prajāpatitvam atharvā vai prajāpatiḥ prajāpatir iva vai sa
GV02gopthbru:4_10: sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti ya evaṃ veda // GpBr_1,1.4 //
GV02gopthbru:5_0: tam atharvāṇam ṛṣim abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tasmāc chrāntāt taptāt saṃtaptāt
GV02gopthbru:5_1: daśatayān atharvaṇa ṛṣīn niramimataikarcān dvyṛcāṃs tṛcāṃś caturṛcān pañcarcān ṣaḍarcān
GV02gopthbru:5_2: saptarcān aṣṭarcān navarcān daśarcān iti / tān atharvaṇa ṛṣīn abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat
GV02gopthbru:5_3: samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyaḥ daśatayān ātharvaṇān ārṣeyān
GV02gopthbru:5_4: niramimataikādaśān dvādaśāṃs trayodaśāṃś caturdaśān pañcadaśān ṣoḍaśān saptadaśān
GV02gopthbru:5_5: aṣṭādaśān navadaśān viṃśān iti / tān atharvaṇa ṛṣīn ātharvaṇāṃś cārṣeyān abhyaśrāmyad
GV02gopthbru:5_6: abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyo yān mantrān apaśyat
GV02gopthbru:5_7: sa ātharvaṇo vedo 'bhavat tam ātharvaṇaṃ vedam abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat
GV02gopthbru:5_8: tasmāc chrāntāt taptāt saṃtaptād om iti mana evordhvam akṣaram udakrāmat sa ya icchet
GV02gopthbru:5_9: sarvair etair atharvabhiś cātharvaṇī kurvīyety etayaiva taṃ mahāvyāhṛtyā kurvīta /
GV02gopthbru:5_10: sarvair ha vā asyaitair atharvabhiś cātharvaṇaiś ca kṛtaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda yaś
GV02gopthbru:5_11: caivaṃ vidvān evam etayā mahāvyāhṛtyā kurute // GpBr_1,1.5 //
GV02gopthbru:6_0: sa bhūyo 'śrāmyad bhūyo 'tapyad bhūya ātmānaṃ samatapat sa ātmata eva trīṃl lokān
GV02gopthbru:6_1: niramimata pṛthivīm antarikṣaṃ divam iti / sa khalu pādābhyām eva pṛthivīṃ niramimatodarād
GV02gopthbru:6_2: antarikṣam mūrdhno divam / sa tāṃs trīn lokān abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ
GV02gopthbru:6_3: śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyas trīn devān niramimatāgniṃ vāyum ādityam iti /
GV02gopthbru:6_4: sa khalu pṛthivyā evāgniṃ niramimatāntarikṣād vāyuṃ diva ādityam / sa tāṃs trīn devān
GV02gopthbru:6_5: abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyas trīn
GV02gopthbru:6_6: vedān niramimata ṛgvedaṃ yajurvedaṃ sāmavedam iti agne ṛgvedaṃ vāyor yajurvedam ādityāt
GV02gopthbru:6_7: sāmavedam / sa tāṃs trīn vedān abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas
GV02gopthbru:6_8: taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyas tisro mahāvyāhṛtīr niramimata bhūr bhuvaḥ svar iti / bhūr
GV02gopthbru:6_9: ity ṛgvedāt bhuva iti yajurvedāt svar iti sāmavedāt / sa ya icchet sarvair etais
GV02gopthbru:6_10: tribhir vedaiḥ kurvīyety etābhir eva taṃ mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ kurvīta sarvair ha vā asyaitais
GV02gopthbru:6_11: tribhir vedaiḥ kṛtaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda yaś caivaṃ vidvān evam etābhir mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ
GV02gopthbru:7_0: tā yā amū retaḥ samudraṃ vṛtvātiṣṭhaṃs tāḥ prācyo dakṣiṇācyaḥ pratīcya udīcyaḥ samavadravanta /
GV02gopthbru:7_1: tad yat samavadravanta tasmāt samudra ucyate / tā bhītā abruvan bhagavantam eva vayaṃ
GV02gopthbru:7_2: rājānaṃ vṛṇīmaha iti / yac ca vṛtvātiṣṭhaṃs tadvaraṇo 'bhavat taṃ vā etaṃ varaṇaṃ
GV02gopthbru:7_3: santaṃ varuṇa ity ācakṣate / parokṣeṇa parokṣapriyā iva hi devā bhavanti pratyakṣadviṣaḥ /
GV02gopthbru:7_4: sa samudrād amucyata sa mucyur abhavat taṃ vā etaṃ mucyuṃ santaṃ mṛtyur ity ācakṣate /
GV02gopthbru:7_5: parokṣeṇa parokṣapriyā iva hi devā bhavanti pratyakṣadviṣaḥ / taṃ varuṇaṃ mṛtyum
GV02gopthbru:7_6: abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tasya śrāntasya taptasya saṃtaptasya sarvebhyo
GV02gopthbru:7_7: 'ṅgebhyo raso 'kṣarat so 'ṅgaraso 'bhavat taṃ vā etam aṅgarasaṃ santam aṅgirā ity
GV02gopthbru:7_8: ācakṣate / parokṣeṇa parokṣapriyā iva hi devā bhavanti pratyakṣadviṣaḥ // GpBr_1,1.7 //
GV02gopthbru:8_0: tam aṅgirasam ṛṣim abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tasmāc chrāntāt taptāt saṃtaptād
GV02gopthbru:8_1: viṃśino 'ṅgirasa ṛṣīn niramimata tān viṃśino 'ṅgirasa ṛṣīn abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat
GV02gopthbru:8_2: samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyo daśatayān āṅgirasān ārṣeyān
GV02gopthbru:8_3: niramimata ṣoḍaśino 'ṣṭādaśino dvādaśina ekarcāṃs tṛcāṃś caturṛcān pañcarcān ṣaḍarcān
GV02gopthbru:8_4: dvyṛcān saptarcān iti / tān aṅgirasa ṛṣīn āṅgirasāṃś cārṣeyān abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat
GV02gopthbru:8_5: samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyo yān mantrān apaśyatsa āṅgiraso
GV02gopthbru:8_6: vedo 'bhavat tam āṅgirasaṃ vedam abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tasmāc chrāntāt
GV02gopthbru:8_7: taptāt saṃtaptāj janad iti dvaitam akṣaraṃ vyabhavat / sa ya icchet sarvair etair
GV02gopthbru:8_8: aṅgirobhiś cāṅgirasaiś ca kurvīyety etayaiva taṃ mahāvyāhṛtyā kurvīta sarvair ha
GV02gopthbru:8_9: vā asyaitair aṅgirobhiś cāṅgirasaiś ca kṛtaṃ bhavati ya eva veda yaś caiva vidvān
GV02gopthbru:9_0: sa ūrdhvo 'tiṣṭhat sa imāṃl lokān vyaṣṭabhnāt tasmād aṅgiraso 'dhīyāna ūrdhvas tiṣṭhati
GV02gopthbru:9_1: tad vrataṃ sa manasā dhyāyed yad vā ahaṃ kiṃcana manasā dhyāsyāmi tathaiva tad bhaviṣyati
GV02gopthbru:9_2: taddha sma tathaiva bhavati / tad apy etad ṛcoktam / śreṣṭho ha vedas tapaso 'dhijāto
GV02gopthbru:9_3: brahmajyānāṃ kṣitaye saṃbabhūva ṛjyad bhūtaṃ yad asṛjyatedaṃ niveśanam anṛṇaṃ dūram
GV02gopthbru:9_4: asyeti / tā vā etā aṅgirasāṃ yāmayo yan menayaḥ karoti menibhir vīryaṃ ya eva veda // GpBr_1,1.9 //
GV02gopthbru:10_0: sa diśau 'nvaikṣata prācīṃ dakṣiṇāṃ pratīcīm udīcīṃ dhruvām ūrdhvām iti / tās tatraivābhyaśrāmyad
GV02gopthbru:10_1: abhyatapat samatapat tābhyaḥ śrāntābhyas taptābhyaḥ saṃtaptābhyaḥ pañca vedān niramimata
GV02gopthbru:10_2: sarpavedaṃ piśācavedam asuravedam itihāsavedaṃ purāṇavedam iti / sa khalu prācyā
GV02gopthbru:10_3: eva diśaḥ sarpavedaṃ niramimata dakṣiṇasyāḥ piśācavedaṃ pratīcyā asuravedam udīcyā
GV02gopthbru:10_4: itihāsavedaṃ dhruvāyāś cordhvāyāś ca purāṇavedam / sa tān pañca vedān abhyaśrāmyad
GV02gopthbru:10_5: abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyaḥ pañca mahāvyāhṛtīr
GV02gopthbru:10_6: niramimata vṛdhat karad guhan mahat tad iti / vṛdhad iti sarpavedāt karad iti piśācavedāt
GV02gopthbru:10_7: guhad ity asuravedāt mahad itītihāsavedāt tad iti purāṇavedāt sa ya icchet sarvair
GV02gopthbru:10_8: etaiḥ pañcabhir vedaiḥ kurvīyety etābhir eva taṃ mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ kurvīta sarvair
GV02gopthbru:10_9: ha vā asyaitaiḥ pañcabhir vedaiḥ kṛtaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda yaś caivaṃ vidvān evam
GV02gopthbru:11_0: sa āvataś ca parāvataś cānvaikṣata tās tatraivābhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tābhyaḥ
GV02gopthbru:11_1: śrāntābhyas taptābhyaḥ saṃtaptābhyaḥ śam ity ūrdhvam akṣaram udakrāmat / sa ya icchet
GV02gopthbru:11_2: sarvābhir etābhir āvadbhiś ca parāvadbhiś ca kurvīyety etayaiva taṃ mahāvyāhṛtyā
GV02gopthbru:11_3: kurvīta sarvābhir ha vā asyaitābhir āvadbhiś ca parāvadbhiś ca kṛtaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ
GV02gopthbru:11_4: veda yaś caivaṃ vidvān evam etayā mahāvyāhṛtyā kurute // GpBr_1,1.11 //
GV02gopthbru:12_0: sa bhūyo 'śrāmyat bhūyo 'tapyat bhūya ātmānaṃ samatapat sa manasa eva candramasaṃ
GV02gopthbru:12_1: niramimata nakhebhyo nakṣatrāṇi lomabhya oṣadhivanaspatīn kṣudrebhyaḥ prāṇebhyo 'nyān
GV02gopthbru:12_2: bahūn devān / sa bhūyo 'śrāmyad bhūyo 'tapyat bhūya ātmānaṃ samatapat sa etaṃ trivṛtaṃ
GV02gopthbru:12_3: saptatantum ekaviṃśatisaṃsthaṃ yajñam apaśyat / tad apy etad ṛcoktam / agnir yajñaṃ
GV02gopthbru:12_4: trivṛtaṃ saptatantum iti / athāpy eṣa prākrīḍitaḥ ślokaḥ pratyabhivadati sapta sutyāḥ
GV02gopthbru:13_0: tam āharat yenāyajata tasyāgnir hotāsīt vāyur adhvaryuḥ sūrya udgātā candramā brahmā
GV02gopthbru:13_1: parjanyaḥ sadasya oṣadhivanaspatayaś camasā adhvaryavo viśvedevā hotrakā atharvāṅgiraso
GV02gopthbru:13_2: goptāras taṃ ha smaitam evaṃ vidvāṃsaḥ pūrve śrotriyā yajñaṃ tataṃ sāvasāya ha smāhety
GV02gopthbru:13_3: abhivrajanti mā no 'yaṃ gharma udyataḥ pramattānām amṛtāḥ prajāḥ prasākṣīd iti tān
GV02gopthbru:13_4: vāyetān parirakṣakān sadaḥprasarpakān ity ācakṣate dakṣiṇāsamṛddhāṃs tad u ha smāha
GV02gopthbru:13_5: prajāpatir yad vai yajñe 'kuśalā ṛtvijo bhavanty acaritino brahmacaryam aparāgyā
GV02gopthbru:13_6: vā tad vai yajñasya viriṣṭam ity ācakṣate / yajñasya viriṣṭam anuyajamāno viriṣyate
GV02gopthbru:13_7: yajamānasya viriṣṭam anvṛtvijo viriṣyanta ṛtvijāṃ viriṣṭam anudakṣiṇā viriṣyante
GV02gopthbru:13_8: dakṣiṇānāṃ viriṣṭam anuyajamānaḥ putrapaśubhir viriṣyate putrapaśūnāṃ viriṣṭam anuyajamānaḥ
GV02gopthbru:13_9: svarge lokena viriṣyate svargasya lokasya viriṣṭam anu tasyārdhasya yogakṣemo viriṣyate
GV02gopthbru:13_10: yasminn ardhe yajanta iti brāhmaṇam // GpBr_1,1.13 //
GV02gopthbru:14_0: taṃ ha smaitam evaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ brahmāṇaṃ yajñaviriṣṭo vā yajñaviriṣṭino vety upādhāveran
GV02gopthbru:14_1: namas te astu bhagavan yajñasya no viriṣṭaṃ saṃdhehīti tad yatraiva viriṣṭaṃ syāt
GV02gopthbru:14_2: tatrāgnīn upasamādhāya śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā pṛthivyai śrotrāyeti trir evāgnīn samprokṣati
GV02gopthbru:14_3: triḥ paryukṣati triḥ kārayamāṇam ācāmayati ca samprokṣati ca yajñavāstu ca samprokṣaty
GV02gopthbru:14_4: athāpi vedānāṃ rasena yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdhīyate tad yathā lavaṇena suvarṇaṃ saṃdadhyāt
GV02gopthbru:14_5: suvarṇena rajataṃ rajatena lohaṃ lohena sīsaṃ sīsena eṣv evam evāsya yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ
GV02gopthbru:14_6: saṃdhīyate yajñasya saṃdhitim anu yajamānaḥ saṃdhīyate yajamānasya saṃdhitim anv
GV02gopthbru:14_7: ṛtvijaḥ saṃdhīyanta ṛtvijāṃ saṃdhitim anu dakṣiṇāḥ saṃdhīyante dakṣiṇānāṃ saṃdhitim
GV02gopthbru:14_8: anu yajamānaḥ putrapaśubhiḥ saṃdhīyate putrapaśūnāṃ saṃdhitim anu yajamānaḥ svargeṇa
GV02gopthbru:14_9: lokena saṃdhīyate svargasya lokasya saṃdhitim anu tasyārdhasya yogakṣemaḥ saṃdhīyate
GV02gopthbru:14_10: yasminn ardhe yajanta iti brāhmaṇam // GpBr_1,1.14 //
GV02gopthbru:15_0: tad u ha smāhātharvā devo vijānan yajñaviriṣṭānandānītpupaśamayeran yajñe prāyaścittiḥ
GV02gopthbru:15_1: kriyate 'pi ca yad u bahv iva yajñe vilomaḥ kriyate na caivāsya kācanārtir bhavati
GV02gopthbru:15_2: na ca yajñaviṣkandham upayāty apahanti punar mṛtyum apātyeti punar ājātiṃ kāmacāro

GV02gopthbru:16_0: brahma ha vai brahmāṇaṃ puṣkare sasṛje sa khalu brahmā sṛṣṭaś cintām āpede kenāham

GV02gopthbru:54_0: bhūmir ha vai etad vicchinnaṃ devayajanaṃ yad aprāk pravaṇaṃ yad anudak pravaṇaṃ

GV02gopthbru:58_0: aditir vai prajākāmaudanam apacat tata ucchiṣṭam aśnāt so garbham adhatta tata ādityā

GV02gopthbru:59_0: prajāpatir atharvā devaḥ sa tapas taptvaitaṃ cātuṣprāśyaṃ brahmaudanaṃ niramimata
GV02gopthbru:59_1: caturlokaṃ caturdevaṃ caturvedaṃ catur hautram iti catvāro vā ime lokāḥ pṛthivy antarikṣaṃ
GV02gopthbru:59_2: dyaur āpa iti catvāro vā ime devā agnir vāyur ādityaś candramāḥ catvāro vā ime vedā

GV02gopthbru:60_0: kim upayajña ātreyo bhavatīty ādityaṃ hi tamo jagrāha tad atrir apanunoda tad atrir

GV02gopthbru:73_10: abhivahet kim abhyaśnuyād iti tasmād ṛgvidam eva hotāraṃ vṛṇīṣva yajurvidam adhvaryuṃ
GV02gopthbru:73_11: sāmavidam udgātāram atharvāṅgirovidaṃ brahmāṇaṃ tathā hāsya yajñaś caturṣu lokeṣu
GV02gopthbru:73_12: caturṣu deveṣu caturṣu vedeṣu catasṛṣu hotrāsu catuṣpād yajñaḥ pratiṣṭhati pratitiṣṭhati
GV02gopthbru:73_13: prajayā paśubhir ya evaṃ veda yaś caivam ṛtvijām ārtvijyaṃ veda yaś ca yajñe yajanīyaṃ
GV02gopthbru:74_0: prajāpatir yajñam atanuta sa ṛcaiva hautram akarot yajuṣādhvaryavaṃ sāmnaudgātram
GV02gopthbru:74_1: atharvāṅgirobhir brahmatvaṃ taṃ vā etaṃ mahāvādyaṃ kurute yad ṛcaiva hautram akarod
GV02gopthbru:74_2: yajuṣādhvaryavaṃ sāmnaudgātram atharvāṅgirobhir brahmatvaṃ sa vā eṣa tribhir vedair
GV02gopthbru:74_3: yajñasyānyataraḥ pakṣaḥ saṃskriyate manasaiva brahmā yajñasyānyataraṃ pakṣaṃ saṃskaroty
GV02gopthbru:74_4: ayam u vai yaḥ pavate sa yajñas tasya manaś ca vāk ca vartanir manasā caiva hi vācā
GV02gopthbru:74_5: ca yajñe vahaty ata eva mana iyam eva vāk sa yad vadan nāsti vidyād ardhaṃ me 'sya
GV02gopthbru:74_6: yajñasyāntaragād iti tad yathaikapāt puruṣo yann ekacakro vā ratho vartamāno bhreṣaṃ
GV02gopthbru:74_7: nyety evam evāsya yajño bhreṣaṃ nyeti yajñasya bhreṣam anu yajamāno bhreṣaṃ nyeti
GV02gopthbru:74_8: yajamānasya bhreṣam anv ṛtvijo bhreṣaṃ niyanti ṛtvijāṃ bhreṣam anu dakṣiṇā bhreṣaṃ
GV02gopthbru:74_9: niyanti dakṣiṇānāṃ bhreṣam anu yajamānaḥ putrapaśubhir bhreṣaṃ nyeti putrapaśūnāṃ
GV02gopthbru:74_10: bhreṣam anu yajamānaḥ svargeṇa lokena bhreṣaṃ nyeti svargasya lokasya bhreṣam anu
GV02gopthbru:74_11: tasyārdhasya yogakṣemo bhreṣaṃ nyeti yasminn ardhe yajanta iti brāhmaṇam // GpBr_1,3.2 //
GV02gopthbru:75_0: tad u ha smāha śvetaketur āruṇeyo brahmāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhāṣamāṇam ardhaṃ me 'sya yajñasyāntaragād
GV02gopthbru:75_1: iti tasmād brahmā stute bahiḥ pavamāne vācoyamyam upāṃśvantaryāmābhyām atha ye pavamāna
GV02gopthbru:75_2: udūcus teṣv atha yāni ca stotrāṇi ca śastrāṇy ā vaṣaṭkārāt teṣu sa yad ṛkto bhreṣaṃ
GV02gopthbru:75_3: niyacched oṃ bhūr janad iti gārhapatye juhuyāt yadi yajuṣṭa oṃ bhuvo janad iti dakṣiṇāgnau
GV02gopthbru:75_4: juhuyāt yadi sāmata oṃ svar janad ity āhavanīye juhuyāt yady anājñātā brahmatā oṃ
GV02gopthbru:75_5: bhūr bhuvaḥ svar janad oṃ ity āhavanīya eva juhuyāt tadvākovākyasyarcāṃ yajuṣāṃ sāmnām
GV02gopthbru:75_6: atharvāṅgirasām athopa vedānāṃ rasena yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdhīyate tad yathā lavaṇenety
GV02gopthbru:75_7: uktaṃ tad yathā ubhayapāt puruṣo yann ubhayacakro vā ratho vartamāno 'bhreṣaṃ nyety
GV02gopthbru:75_8: evam evāsya yajño 'bhreṣaṃ nyeti yajñasyābhreṣam anu yajamāno 'bhreṣaṃ nyeti yajamānasyābhreṣam
GV02gopthbru:75_9: anv ṛtvijo 'bhreṣaṃ niyanti ṛtvijām abhreṣam anu dakṣiṇā abhreṣaṃ niyanti dakṣiṇānām
GV02gopthbru:75_10: abhreṣam anu yajamānaḥ putrapaśubhir abhreṣaṃ nyeti putrapaśūnām abhreṣam anu yajamānaḥ
GV02gopthbru:75_11: svargeṇa lokenābhreṣaṃ nyeti svargasya lokasyābhreṣam anu tasyārdhasya yogakṣemo
GV02gopthbru:75_12: 'bhreṣaṃ nyeti yasminn ardhe yajanta iti brāhmaṇam // GpBr_1,3.3 //
GV02gopthbru:76_0: tad yad audumbaryān ma āsiṣṭa hiṅkṛṇot me prāstāvīn ma udake āsīt me subrahmaṇyām
GV02gopthbru:76_1: āhvāsīd ity udgātre dakṣiṇā nīyante grahān me 'grahīt prācārīn me 'śuśruvan me samanasaskārṣīd
GV02gopthbru:76_2: ayākṣīn me 'śāṃsīn me 'vaṣaṭkārṣīn ma ity adhvaryave hotṛṣadana āsiṣṭa ayākṣīn me
GV02gopthbru:76_3: 'śāṃsīn me 'vaṣaṭkārṣīn ma iti hotre devayajanaṃ me 'cīkṛpad brahmā sādaṃ me 'sīsṛpad
GV02gopthbru:76_4: brahmajapān me 'japīt purastāddhomasaṃsthitahomān me 'hauṣīd ayākṣīn me 'śāṃsīn me
GV02gopthbru:76_5: 'vaṣaṭkārṣīn ma iti brahmaṇe bhūyiṣṭhena mā brahmaṇākārṣīd ity etad vai bhūyiṣṭhaṃ
GV02gopthbru:76_6: brahma yad bhṛgvaṅgirasaḥ ye 'ṅgiraso ye 'ṅgirasaḥ sa rasaḥ ye 'tharvāṇā ye 'tharvāṇas
GV02gopthbru:76_7: tad bheṣajaṃ yad bheṣajaṃ tad amṛtaṃ yad amṛtaṃ tad brahma sa vā eṣa pūrveṣām ṛtvijām
GV02gopthbru:76_8: ardhabhāgasyārdham itareṣām ardhaṃ brahmaṇa iti brāhmaṇam // GpBr_1,3.4 //
GV02gopthbru:77_0: devāś ca ha vā asurāś ca saṃgrāmaṃ samayatanta tatraitās tistro hotrakā jihmaṃ pratipedire
GV02gopthbru:77_1: tāsām indra ucchāni sāmāni lulopa tāni hotre prāyacchad ājyaṃ ha vai hotur babhūva
GV02gopthbru:77_2: praugaṃ potur vaiśvadevaṃ ha vai hotur babhūva niṣkevalyaṃ neṣṭur marutvatīyaṃ ha
GV02gopthbru:77_3: vai hotur babhūva āgnimārutam āgnīdhrasya tasmād etad abhyastataram iva śasyate yad
GV02gopthbru:77_4: āgnimārutaṃ yasmād ete saṃśaṃsukā iva bhavanti yaddhotā potā neṣṭāgnīdhro mumohe
GV02gopthbru:77_5: vasīta tad brahmeyasām ivāsa tāsām ardhaṃ pratilulopa prathamārhaṇaṃ ca prathamapadaṃ
GV02gopthbru:77_6: caitad dakṣiṇāṃ caitat pariśiṣeded iti brāhmaṇam // GpBr_1,3.5 //
GV02gopthbru:78_0: uddālako ha vā āruṇir udīcyān vṛto dhāvayāṃcakāra tasya ha niṣka upāhito babhūva
GV02gopthbru:78_1: upavādād bibhyato yo mā brāhmaṇo 'nūcāna upavadiṣyati tasmā etaṃ pradāsyāmīti taddhodīcyān
GV02gopthbru:78_2: brāhmaṇān bhayaṃ bibheda uddālako ha vā ayam āyāti kaurupāñcālī brahmā brahmaputraḥ
GV02gopthbru:78_3: sa ūrdhvaṃ vṛto na paryādadhīta kenemaṃ vīreṇa prati saṃyatāmahā iti taṃ yata eva

GV02gopthbru:78_5: tvaṃ vai no brahmiṣṭho 'sīti tvayemaṃ vīreṇa pratisayatāmahā iti taṃ yata eva prapannaṃ
